review: Works great.  So far I have not found a lot of Christian movies.
author: Russell Snyder

review: Much more responsive than Roku, but no access to Google Play content.
author: Jonathan H.

review: We have a Roku for our main television and the Fire TV stick in our bedroom.  For the difference in price, I would have gone with the Fire TV stick in both locations had I known then what I know now.  The Fire Stick works perfectly and we are able to watch shows on Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Hulu Plus, as well as play Pandora radio.  That is all we really do through our streaming devices.  For $39, I think the Fire TV Stick is a bargain and would also be very easy to take with us when we travel.  I highly recommend it.
author: OT in NC

review: Great! I got if for free with sling TV and use it for Sling, HBO Go, Netflix, Hulu & Prime. Bye Direct TV
author: F.C.

review: If you're last looking for a place to stream all your shows and movies, this is what you are looking for.
